pages.text: Light as a cloud, $(thing)Aerbunnies$() can often be seen leaping high then floating slowly down around the islands of the $(thing)Aether$(). If you're quick, you can catch one, and hold it over your head, slowing your fall, increasing your jump height, and allowing you to jump 1 extra time in midair.$(br2)Killing an $(thing)Aerbunny$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.
